PIN.values: |<-- Some global things|
|Midi is basic at the moment and only controls the current active patch, I've had no need of it yet!&cr;&lf;Please present your solutions!|
|when we have multiple processes it can get confusing which patch your working on|

|Time line&cr;&lf;left click move&cr;&lf;single right click also makes the preset active so you can see the values stored&cr;&lf;double right click ->delete keyframe&cr;&lf;alt+z undo, shft+alt+z redo&cr;&lf;shift + drag copy key frame (key is left where you hit shift, so if you drag before hitting shift, the keyframe will move from its original position)]#&cr;&lf;+/- zoom in and out timeline &cr;&lf;Shift+ +/- zoom all the way in/out&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;Keys&cr;&lf;left arrow back 5secs&cr;&lf;right arrow for 5secs&cr;&lf;up Loop&cr;&lf;Down Play&cr;&lf;Home goto start&cr;&lf;scroll up previous key&cr;&lf;scroll down next key&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;Sliders&cr;&lf;Left click to change value, right click to fine tune&cr;&lf;double right click to type entry&cr;&lf;to do, middle set to default value&cr;&lf;Right Click name to set to Default Value&cr;&lf;Double click the name to enable selective record, it will show red on active channels&cr;&lf;The box will be blue if the channel is in the active preset&cr;&lf;&cr;&lf;Presets&cr;&lf;Left Click Bank button to scroll 1 line&cr;&lf;right click to scroll 1 page&cr;&lf;Left click to play preset&cr;&lf;Right click to record into preset&cr;&lf;Keys 1-8, q-i, a-k, z-, play preset&cr;&lf;|
|All Files (*.*)||*.*|
|v4 version to open patch with|

|To start a new project, open this gui patch, then select the patch you to kontrol in this iobox.&cr;&lf;Enable autostart + Save to start the patch everytime&cr;&lf;You also need to include the Kontrol_Client patch to the root of your patch so it can communicate with the GUI|

|The project folder is created in the patch you have loaded folder, eg /yourpatch/Projects/ProjectName&cr;&lf;These are then available from the 1st top menu button. You can copy this project to another by clicking copy project in the prefs menu&cr;&lf;When you have named the project then bang the button to create the folders and files|
|FPS is a 'snap' setting for keyframes|

|The GUI is made for 1080, if you need less than that, you may have to mess with text sizing, which isn't currently 1 setting as I am using sprites mixed with dynamic type only when needed, due to performance issues with text|

|Your free to use this patch commercially ( as long as you have a vvvv licence ;) CC BY-SA&cr;&lf;Please note it requires DataTable (ElliotWoods,Woei,Tonfilm, Included) dx11 (Vux) packs&cr;&lf;PinInfoAdvanced and a couple of other helper plugins, are included and by Elektromeier, Tweener by Westbam, and probably other patches and snippets not mentioned!&cr;&lf;If you do use it, then please report bugs, and if you fix them or add any features make them available for other users so this patch can progress for different usages, I want real time after effects meets multiscreen show control, nothing too elaborate ;)&cr;&lf;Flag issues/wishes/suggestions in the forums&cr;&lf;I have conflicting ideas of how to go on from this regarding multiple playlists, ideally you should be able to sequence playlists with in and out points like a track in after effects/logic/cubase etc&cr;&lf;Also currently fades are per preset not per keyframe, (presets are keyframes, I think I need to override times per keyframe...)&cr;&lf;HSVA colour io's get converted to RGB for kontroleur, and so there is some oddness when using them :( Workaround is to separtate them tovalues in the patch and loose the colour box.&cr;&lf;To do:- Tags should be used for custom gui elements, like movie player, XY, colours from values for better colour control&cr;&lf; etc |
|Catweasel April 2015&cr;&lf;www.colour-burst.com|

|/73/76/2/Y Input Value|,|Max Radius|,,Value,|Endless, 1, 1, 0, 1, 0.01, , 4|,Real,Endless,0,1,Toggle,,0,0.3386,NodesAndWords,|/73/76/52/Y Input Value|,|Period o No|,,Value,|Endless, 1, 1, 0.01, 10, 0.01, s, 4|,Real,Endless,0,10,Toggle,,0,1,NodesAndWords,|/73/76/56/Y Input Value|,ThresoldNo,,Value,|Endless, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0.01, , 4|,Real,Endless,0,1,Toggle,,0,0,NodesAndWords,|/73/76/57/Y Input Value|,|Period2 Never|,,Value,|Endless, 1, 1, 0.01, 10, 0.01, s, 4|,Real,Endless,0,10,Toggle,,0,1,NodesAndWords,|/73/76/58/Y Input Value|,ThresoldNever,,Value,|Endless, 1, 0, 0, 1, 0.01, , 4|,Real,Endless,0,1,Toggle,,0,0,NodesAndWords,|/73/76/59/Y Input Value|,SwitchWords,,Value,|Slider, 1, 0, 0, 50, 1, , 4|,Integer,Slider,0,50,Toggle,,0,0,NodesAndWords,|/73/76/60/Input Enum|,|Text Rendering Mode|,,Enumeration,|PullDown, TextRenderingMode, SingleLine|,,,,,,|SingleLine, MultiLine, MultiLineWordWrap|,3,SingleLine,NodesAndWords,|/73/76/61/Y Input Value|,Enabled,,Value,|Toggle, 1, 1, 0, 1, 1, , 4|,Boolean,Endless,-99999999,99999999,Toggle,,0,1,NodesAndWords,|/73/76/62/Y Input Value|,Bang,,Value,|Bang, 1, 0, 0, 1, 1, , 4|,Boolean,Endless,-99999999,99999999,Bang,,0,0.3333,NodesAndWords,|/73/76/63/Input String|,text,,String,|String, , , -1|,,,,,,,0,yhwr,NodesAndWords,|/73/76/64/Color Input|,Color,,Color,|HSVAField, r=100% g=100% b=100% a=100% , HasAlpha|,,,,,,,0,|||0.34000,0.34000,0.34000,0.00000|||,NodesAndWords,|/73/88/1/Y Input Value|,Position,,Value,|Endless, 3, 0, -20, 20, 0.01, , 4|,Real,Endless,-20,20,Toggle,,0,|0,0,-1.4323|,ManualCam,|/73/88/5/Y Input Value|,FOV,,Value,|Rotary, 1, 0.25, 0, 0.5, 0.01, , 4|,Real,Endless,0,0.5,Toggle,,0,0.2068,ManualCam
|/allowmultiple /dx9ex|

PIN.values: |<- Audio files go in the project folder, todo, a selector per playlist for file&cr;&lf;If there is no file, a default 5m click track is loaded|
|<- Does the saving and manipulation and communictaion of presets and sequences|
|There are quite a few sends...|
|set the gui to run on cpu 3+4|
|I use the frames to delay initialising parts of the patch|
